sentence.text: Almost inevitably , questions about Dermot sent her into a rage -- and she usually soothed that rage in a bottle .
Only when Maisie came to hold him and soothe his fears did he feel safe .
A soak in a hot tub , brimming with scented foam , was about the only thing that could soothe her wounded spirits .
The concentration calmed her , soothed the worries that had surfaced on the drive from Belfast to the border .
This is the line-up of worriers that Mr Helmut Kohl will try to soothe when he goes to Brussels this Friday .
He placed a gentle finger on her lips to soothe her back to sleep .
I stroke my beard , as if it were Timmy 's brow , trying to soothe myself to sleep .
He read , letting his voice be an instrument to soothe the boy .
To prevent this , his friends would soothe him with music , cool water and adoring maidens until at last he would ` come to himself .
Kodiak , Mrs Knelle 's huge shaggy Alsatian , barked at me excitedly but was soon soothed by his mistress .
Carrie knew that although he was soothed , as she was , by the sound of Hepzibah 's voice , he was not really listening .
There was no denying his words had a soothing effect , but she did n't want to be soothed , she wanted him to accept her version of events .
Had he said this minutes earlier , the baying journalists would have been soothed into silence .
She told me that in the first dreadful night , when she and John stayed in the hospital , she had tried to soothe the time by the old paper game of making words out of words .
The president tried to soothe the unions by promising that , as inflation drops to zero in a few weeks , real pay will increase .
Comfort foods are those which soothe us and make us glad to be alive even on the most miserable of days .

The tropical evening settled heavily about you , and the shadows in which you hid were warm , but each time you soothed yourself into courage and surged forth from ambush you heard witnesses approaching .
The remark , with its suggestion of possible patronage at his command , soothed Yussuf 's ruffled pride .
Those soft sighs and low moans can only mean one thing : the Apostate has offered to soothe away stressed Rainbow 's jangles by massaging her neck and shoulders .
It comforted , soothed , excited and terrified .
And you hear it , how it soothes with its gentle patter
